Question: In 2012, this person endorsed Barack Obama for President.
Hints: In 1994, this person became a minority owner of the Lakers, having reportedly paid more than $10 million for part ownership.
The Lakers finished the season on a ten game losing streak, and this person's final record as a head coach was 5-11.
During the Finals, this person averaged 18.0 points on .560 shooting, 13.6 assists, and 7.7 rebounds per game.
